snippet: New federal rules for the management of national forests are a great improvement on existing guidelines and are more protective of the environment.
abstract: Editorial expresses support for important and long overdue rules the Obama administration is finalizing for the management of 155 national forests covering nearly 200 million acres; notes that new rules are a great improvement on existing guidelines and are more protective of the environment.
lead_paragraph: New federal rules for the management of national forests are a great improvement on existing guidelines and are more protective of the environment.
